tool.name: Schrodinger Protein Descriptors

param.label: PDB structures
param.help: A collection of PDB structures for which to calculate schrodinger protein descriptors.

param.label: Numbering scheme
param.help: The antibody numbering scheme to pass to schrodinger

param.label: pH
param.help: The pH at which to calculate protein descriptors at; Will affect protonation of charged residues.

param.name: schrodinger_path
param.label: Path to Schrodinger Suite
param.help: The full path from root to the Schrodinger Suite installation. By default, Schrodinger installs in '/opt/schrodinger/suitesYYYY-V'.

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark.
**What it does**
This tool takes a collection of PDBs containing structures of Abs. Using the Schrodinger *Protein Descriptors Calculation* task, it predicts a set of descriptive measures for each structure. It outputs a CSV file with an entry for each Ab structure.
Note that this Schrodinger tool will submit jobs to the limited computational license, which will affect the cue of running jobs for other Schrodinger users using the same license server. Take this into account before running large sets of PDBs.
